1:
Praise Yahweh.
\q Blessed is the man who obeys Yahweh,
\q who greatly delights in his commandments.
\q
2:
His descendants will be powerful on earth;
\q the descendants of the godly man will be blessed.
5:
It goes well for the man who deals graciously and lends money,
\q who conducts his affairs with honesty.
7:
He does not fear bad news;
\q he is confident, trusting in Yahweh.
8:
His heart is tranquil, without fear,
\q until he looks in triumph over his adversaries.
\q
